metadata.title: CVE-2020-28502 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package xmlhttprequest before 1.7.0; all versions ofpackage xmlhttprequest-ssl. Provided requests are sent synchronously(async=False on xhr.open), malicious user input flowing into xhr.send couldresult in arbitrary code being injected and run.

criterions.comment: node-xmlhttprequest package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
node-xmlhttprequest-ssl package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
